content: 2nd round k all sts without decreases repeat rounds 1-2 7 8 9 more times you have 56 64 68 sts all together 14 16 17 sts on each needle / section continue decreases on every row until 5 sts remain on one needle / in one section you have 20 sts in total cut yarn and pull through all sts thread the yarn onto a tapestry needle and pull it so that the crown opening shuts close and sew together on the wrong side finishing weave in all ends if you wish you may block your beanie by soaking it in cold to lukewarm water fold up the brim at the fold up edge and let it dry flat enjoy your fox beanie when posting pictures in social media use hashtag #foxbeanie you may also tag me @annan_neuleet on instagram thank you for knitting my patterns © anna syrjänen chart lilac underlining the chart repeat © anna syrjänen abbreviations k = knit p = purl st = stitch sts = stitches pm = place marker sm = stitch marker bor = beginning of round mc = main color cc = contrasting color k2tog = knit 2 sts together © anna syrjänen
